word_mean: 种间共处：同时存在的不同种生物间无互相作用

sentence.Network_en: Neutralism differs from neutrality in that it is an attitude of mind in time of peace rather than a legal status in time of war.
sentence.Network_cn: Neutralism与neutrality的不同之处在于前者表示和平环境时的态度,而不是战争中有法律作用状态或地位.

sentence.Network_en: He put intense pressure on Souvanna to forsake neutralism.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对棱发那施加强大压力,要他放弃中立主义.

sentence.Network_en: Higher education has the characteristics of objectiveness, multi - dimension and neutralism.
sentence.Network_cn: 高等教育功能具有客观性 、 多维 性和中性等特征.

sentences.en: Neutralism differs from neutrality in that it is an attitude of mind in time of peace rather than a legal status in time of war.
sentences.cn: Neutralism 与neutrality的不同之处在于前者表示和平环境时的态度，而不是战争中有法律作用状态或地位。
